page.title: 15Transport
page.content: I think most families in this area have a{car,}as the nearest town is at least seven miles away. There is {public transport}available but this is very limited. {East Staffs District Council}provide a bus service which travels through Rangemore village at 7.55 a.m. going to Tatenhill, and then to Burton. It makes the return journey in the late afternoon, arriving in Rangemore at 5.02 p.m. Not many people use it regularly but a survey made by the schoolchildren revealed that it was needed by a few. The remainder go to work by car. On Thursdays and Saturdays it is Market Day in Burton.{Stevensons of {Uttoxeter}provide a bus which travels through several villages, stopping in Rangemore at 10.45 a.m. and returning from Burton at 1.30 p.m.
